QDA is particularly useful if there is prior knowledge that individual classes exhibit distinct covariances. A disadvantage of QDA is that it cannot be used as a dimensionality reduction technique. More flexible than LDA. Here, there is no assumption that the covariance matrix of classes is the same.'}
